panels.description: Shows if network metrics are being received for the selected time range.
panels.title: Metrics Status

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received for the network in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Latest Metrics

panels.description: Average uptime of online devices in hours. Shows network stability and device reliability.
panels.title: Avg Uptime

panels.description: Total bandwidth usage across all devices in the network per second.
panels.title: Total Bandwidth

panels.description: Number of different Tailscale versions currently deployed across all devices in the network. Lower values indicate better version consistency.
panels.title: Version Diversity

panels.description: Percentage of registered devices that are currently online and connected to the Tailscale network.
panels.title: Online Rate

panels.description: Network quality score based on packet loss and direct connections
panels.title: Network Quality Score

title: Tailscale / Overview
description: Comprehensive overview dashboard for Tailscale networks using tsmetrics. Shows device status, network health, traffic analysis, and service monitoring.
